campaign.text: I believe that actions of support for the FSFE are important for encouraging Free Software development and adoption in Europe as well as the rest of the world. I'm an FSFE Fellow because financially supporting the cause of Free Software brings positive improvements to all societies throughout the world.
campaign.author: Jacob Appelbaum - Spokesperson for The TOR Project
campaign.copyright: Jacob Appelbaum's photo by Stephan Röhl (Heinrich-Böll-Stiftung) used with CC BY SA 2.0 license
